title.narrative: Fiscal laws and policies prioritize revenue and budgetary allocations in favor of Gender Equality and Women Empowerment.

description.narrative: This outcome aims to provide technical advice on integrating the gender equality principle into all laws, policies and budgets on the basis of earlier analyses. Tracking and monitoring gender-sensitive allocations and results through the operationalization of gender-responsive medium-term budget programs (MTBP) to increase national accountability on spending for gender-equality results is one component whereas the other focuses on gender responsive budgeting on local government level.

participating-org.narrative: Sweden, through Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida)

provider-org.narrative: Sweden, through Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida)
Sweden, through Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida)
Sweden, through Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (Sida)

title.narrative: SN_DRF

UN System in Albania is equipped with effective coordination mechanisms, knowledge products, tools, and capacities to promote accountability and deliver on its commitments on gender equality and women’s empowerment

description.narrative: Percentage of indicators of the UNCT SWAP Scorecard indicators that are 'exceeding requirements' for Albania

title.narrative: Local government units implement gender responsive budgeting.

National and local partners have increased capacities to generate and use comprehensive disaggregated data to advocate for, develop, implement and monitor gender-responsive evidence-based policies and programmes.
